error_alert_text: Something went wrong! Please try again.
token_expired_alert_text: Please log in again to continue.
name: Name
home_lead_paragraph: Perhaps not a Google Keep-killer, but gets the job done.
home_secondary_paragraph: Create notes for yourself so that you can read those very same notes later, or never come back and read them again.  Your choice!
notes_create_save_error_message: The note could not be saved.  Reload this page and try creating your note again.
notes_index_notes_exist_lead_message: Tap or click on text to edit it
notes_index_load_error_message: There was a problem loading your notes.  Reload the page and try again.
notes_index_save_error_message: There was a problem saving this note.  Reload the page and try again.
notes_index_confirm_note_delete_message: Once this note is deleted, it cannot be recovered.  Are you sure you want to delete it forever?
notes_index_delete_error_message: There was a problem when trying to delete this note. Please reload the page and try again.
